title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 205.1 - Security for deposits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 205.1 - Security for deposits

State Regulations

All deposits of monies of the New York State Thruway

Authority, from whatever source derived, shall be secured by obligations of the

United States or of the State of New York of a market value equal at all times
to the amount of the deposit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2

205.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
